# Linux Shell脚本教程：30分钟玩转Shell脚本编程

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/linux-shell-jiaoben-jiaocheng-30-fenzhong-wanzhuan-shell-jiaoben-biancheng
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/linux-shell-jiaoben-jiaocheng-30-fenzhong-wanzhuan-shell-jiaoben-biancheng
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install linux-shell-jiaoben-jiaocheng-30-fenzhong-wanzhuan-shell-jiaoben-biancheng
linux-shell-jiaoben-jiaocheng-30-fenzhong-wanzhuan-shell-jiaoben-biancheng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g linux-shell-jiaoben-jiaocheng-sanling-fenzhong-wanzhuan-shell-jiaoben-biancheng
linux-shell-jiaoben-jiaocheng-sanling-fenzhong-wanzhuan-shell-jiaoben-biancheng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
